mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY /*국책과제개요*/ ( TSS_CD --과제코드 , TTL_CRRO_STRT_DT --총수행시작일 , TTL_CRRO_FNH_DT --총수행종료일 , STRT_DT --과제시작일 , FNH_DT --과제종료일 , FIN_YN --최종차수여부 , SMRY_TXT --개발대상기술 및 제품개요 , TSS_SMRY_TXT --과제개요 , TSS_SMRY_CTQ_TXT --과제개요 - CTQ , TSS_SMRY_DVLP_TXT --과제개요 - 주요연구개발내용 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_TXT --연구개발성과 - 지재권 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_EFF_TXT --연구개발성과 - 파급효과 , FNO_PLN_TXT --향후계획 , BIZ_EXP_ARSL_TXT --사업비실적 , BIZ_EXP , ALTR_RSON_TXT --변경사유 , ADD_RSON_TXT --추가사유 , DCAC_RSON_TXT --중단사유 , ATTC_FIL_ID -- , ALTR_ATTC_FIL_ID -- , CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID -- , DCAC_ATTC_FIL_ID -- , FRST_RGST_DT --최초등록일시 , FRST_RGST_ID --최초등록자 , LAST_MDFY_DT --최종수정일시 , LAST_MDFY_ID --최종수정자 , STRT_DT_1 , FNH_DT_1 , STRT_DT_2 , FNH_DT_2 , STRT_DT_3 , FNH_DT_3 , STRT_DT_4 , FNH_DT_4 , STRT_DT_5 , FNH_DT_5 ) SELECT #{tssCd} , TTL_CRRO_STRT_DT , TTL_CRRO_FNH_DT , STRT_DT , FNH_DT , FIN_YN , SMRY_TXT , #{tssSmryTxt} , TSS_SMRY_CTQ_TXT , TSS_SMRY_DVLP_TXT , #{rsstDvlpOucmTxt} , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_EFF_TXT , #{fnoPlnTxt} , #{bizExpArslTxt} , BIZ_EXP , ALTR_RSON_TXT , ADD_RSON_TXT , DCAC_RSON_TXT , NULL , NULL , #{attcFilId} , NULL , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} , STRT_DT_1 , FNH_DT_1 , STRT_DT_2 , FNH_DT_2 , STRT_DT_3 , FNH_DT_3 , STRT_DT_4 , FNH_DT_4 , STRT_DT_5 , FNH_DT_5 FROM IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY /*국책과제개요*/ WHERE TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY /*국책과제개요*/ SET TSS_SMRY_TXT = #{tssSmryTxt} --과제개요 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_TXT = #{rsstDvlpOucmTxt} --연구개발성과 , FNO_PLN_TXT = #{fnoPlnTxt} --향후계획 , BIZ_EXP_ARSL_TXT = #{bizExpArslTxt} --사업비실적 , CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID = #{attcFilId} -- , LAST_MDFY_DT = GETDATE() , LAST_MDFY_ID = #{userId} WHERE TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
mapper.select: SELECT TSS_CD , CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 23) AS createDate , (SELECT DATEDIFF(MM, X.TTL_CRRO_STRT_DT, X.TTL_CRRO_FNH_DT) + 1 FROM IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY X WHERE X.TSS_CD = T2.TSS_CD) AS mMDiff , STUFF((SELECT DISTINCT ', ' + dbo.fn_getSabunName(SA_SABUN_NEW) FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR as T1 WHERE T1.TSS_CD = T2.TSS_CD FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS mbrNmList FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR T2 WHERE T2.TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd} GROUP BY TSS_CD

SELECT Z.TSS_NOS_ST AS tssNosSt , Z.TSS_CD AS tssCd , Z.PGS_STEP_CD AS pgsStepCd , Z.YY AS yy , Z.YY_NOS AS yyNos , SUM(Z.YY_NOS) OVER (PARTITION BY 0) AS yyNosSum FROM (SELECT X.TSS_NOS_ST , X.TSS_CD , X.PGS_STEP_CD , X.YY , CASE WHEN X.TSS_NOS_ST = '1' THEN SUM(B.YY_NOS_CASH1 + B.YY_NOS_ATHG1)/1000 WHEN X.TSS_NOS_ST = '2' THEN SUM(B.YY_NOS_CASH2 + B.YY_NOS_ATHG2)/1000 WHEN X.TSS_NOS_ST = '3' THEN SUM(B.YY_NOS_CASH3 + B.YY_NOS_ATHG3)/1000 WHEN X.TSS_NOS_ST = '4' THEN SUM(B.YY_NOS_CASH4 + B.YY_NOS_ATHG4)/1000 WHEN X.TSS_NOS_ST = '5' THEN SUM(B.YY_NOS_CASH5 + B.YY_NOS_ATHG5)/1000 END AS YY_NOS FROM (SELECT A.TSS_NOS_ST, A.TSS_CD, A.PGS_STEP_CD, SUBSTRING(B.STRT_DT, 1, 4) AS YY FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST A , IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_SMRY B WHERE A.TSS_CD = B.TSS_CD AND A.PK_WBS_CD = #{pkWbsCd} AND A.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG') X , IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_BIZ_EXP B WHERE X.TSS_CD = B.TSS_CD AND B.BIZ_EXP_CD in ('ba', 'bb') GROUP BY X.TSS_NOS_ST, X.TSS_CD, X.PGS_STEP_CD, X.YY) Z ORDER BY Z.TSS_NOS_ST

select case when a.arslCnt > 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as chkYn from ( SELECT count(*) as arslCnt FROM IRIS_TSS_GOAL_ARSL /*과제목표_실적*/ WHERE TSS_CD = (select CASE WHEN A.TSS_SCN_CD = 'N' THEN (SELECT X.TSS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST X WHERE X.PK_WBS_CD = A.PK_WBS_CD AND X.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND X.TSS_NOS_ST = A.TSS_NOS_ST) ELSE (SELECT X.TSS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST X WHERE X.PK_WBS_CD = A.PK_WBS_CD AND X.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG') END AS pgTssCd --진행과제코드 FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST A /*과제관리마스터*/ LEFT JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST B /*프로젝트연구마스터*/ ON A.PRJ_CD = B.PRJ_CD WHERE A.TSS_CD = #{tssCd} ) and (convert(nvarchar(max), ARSL) = '' or convert(nvarchar(max), ARSL) is null) ) a

select case when a.allCnt - b.attCnt = 0 then 'Y' else 'N' end as chkYn from ( select count(*) as allCnt from IRIS_TSS_YLD_ITM where tss_cd = (select CASE WHEN A.TSS_SCN_CD = 'N' THEN (SELECT X.TSS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST X WHERE X.PK_WBS_CD = A.PK_WBS_CD AND X.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND X.TSS_NOS_ST = A.TSS_NOS_ST) ELSE (SELECT X.TSS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST X WHERE X.PK_WBS_CD = A.PK_WBS_CD AND X.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG') END AS pgTssCd --진행과제코드 FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST A /*과제관리마스터*/ LEFT JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST B /*프로젝트연구마스터*/ ON A.PRJ_CD = B.PRJ_CD WHERE A.TSS_CD = #{tssCd} ) ) a ,( select count(distinct ATTC_FIL_ID) as attCnt from IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL where DEL_YN ='N' and ATTC_FIL_ID in ( select ATTC_FIL_ID from IRIS_TSS_YLD_ITM where tss_cd = (select CASE WHEN A.TSS_SCN_CD = 'N' THEN (SELECT X.TSS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST X WHERE X.PK_WBS_CD = A.PK_WBS_CD AND X.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND X.TSS_NOS_ST = A.TSS_NOS_ST) ELSE (SELECT X.TSS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST X WHERE X.PK_WBS_CD = A.PK_WBS_CD AND X.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG') END AS pgTssCd --진행과제코드 FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST A /*과제관리마스터*/ LEFT JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST B /*프로젝트연구마스터*/ ON A.PRJ_CD = B.PRJ_CD WHERE A.TSS_CD = #{tssCd} ) ) ) b

select case when count(*) > 0 then 'Y' else 'N' end as cnt from IRIS_TSS_NAT_PLCY_RSST_EXP_CDCD where tss_cd = (select CASE WHEN A.TSS_SCN_CD = 'N' THEN (SELECT X.TSS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST X WHERE X.PK_WBS_CD = A.PK_WBS_CD AND X.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND X.TSS_NOS_ST = A.TSS_NOS_ST) ELSE (SELECT X.TSS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST X WHERE X.PK_WBS_CD = A.PK_WBS_CD AND X.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG') END AS pgTssCd --진행과제코드 FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST A /*과제관리마스터*/ LEFT JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST B /*프로젝트연구마스터*/ ON A.PRJ_CD = B.PRJ_CD WHERE A.TSS_CD = #{tssCd} )
